data.title: Local time in Croatia right now
data.meta_description: Check the current time in Croatia and time zone information, the UTC offset and daylight saving time dates in 2024.
data.text:
DST starts on Sunday 31 March 2024, 02:00

DST ends on Sunday 27 October 2024, 03:00

In Croatia the clocks go forward 1:00 hour at 02:00 on Sunday, March 31 and back 1:00 hour at 03:00 on Sunday, October 27.

The period when the clocks are 1:00 hour ahead is called daylight time - Central European Summer Time. Thereâ€™s more daylight in the evenings and less in the mornings (sometimes called Daylight Saving Time).

When the clocks go back, Croatia is on standard time - Central European Time.

Online html clock provided by 24TimeZones.com is really nice and fancy website widget! You can adjust color and size of your Croatia online html clock or choose advanced clocks for almost any country in the world here!

Your Html Clock will look similar to this one:

Zagreb

Configure your own clock using the form below and then click "Get Code" button:

*Country

*Color

*Size

I agree to place the code provided by 24timezones.com on my web pages without making any changes to the text and links. I understand that 24timezones.com may terminate the service in case the code is changed.
